description: Try our easy to follow Chickpea & Tuna Fritters recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Chickpea & Tuna Fritters Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Divide mixture into 8 patties. Heat 1 tbs oil in a frying pan over medium heat. Cook 4 patties for 3 minutes, on each side, or until golden. Repeat with remaining oil and patties.
Divide mixture into 8 patties. Heat 1 tbs oil in a frying pan over medium heat. Cook 4 patties for 3 minutes, on each side, or until golden. Repeat with remaining oil and patties.
